intro: Burmeistera morii, commonly known as the Mexican bellflower, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the family Campanulaceae and is characterized by its showy, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from white to purple. Burmeistera morii is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
